We must not balance the budget at the expense of Vermonters struggling to heat their homes in winter, said Democratic Sen. Bernie Sanders Peter Welch. "Instead of turning off the heat, we should be turning off the billions of dollars in subsidies we provide the oil industry." Patrick Leahy and Sen. Bernie Sanders echoed that sentiment
